long_description: Protect your headlamp and keep it easy to find with the Princeton Tec Stash headlamp case. Case is sized to hold the Princeton Tec Eos, Tactical Eos, Quad, Tactical Quad, Fuel or Scout headlamp, as well as similar size headlamps from other makers. Interior pocket holds an additional headlamp lens or extra batteries. Nylon gear loop lets you attach the case to a pack hipbelt; or you can clip the metal grommet with an accessory carabiner.
short_description: Protect your headlamp and keep it easy to find with the Princeton Tec Stash headlamp case.
